sense.def:
To leave a place
pomeni iti z nekega kraja.

seg.quote: They left the house to go for a walk after tea.
My train leaves at 11.30.

sense.def:
To leave a person or thing somewhere
pomeni, da neka oseba ali stvar ostane tam, kjer je, potem ko odidemo.

seg.quote: Leaving Rita in a bar, I made for the town library.
Leave your phone number with the secretary.
I had left my raincoat in the restaurant.

sense.def:
To leave a place or institution
pomeni za vedno oditi iz nekega kraja ali ustanove.

seg.quote: She wanted to leave China altogether.
What do you want to do when you leave school?
She told him she was going to leave her job.
All they want to do is leave at 16 and get a job.

sense.def:
To leave one's husband or wife
pomeni končati razmerje in prenehati živeti s svojim možem ali ženo.

seg.quote: My husband had left me for another woman.

sense.def:
To leave an amount of something
pomeni ne porabiti določene količine nečesa, tako da ostane na voljo za poznejšo rabo.

seg.quote: Leave some of the stew for the boys.
I meant to leave myself with fifteen pounds a week.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
leaves a mark, effect, or impression
, povzroči, da neko znamenje, učinek ali vtis ostane kot posledica tistega.

seg.quote: I didn't want him to leave a trail of wet footprints.
Does it leave a stain?

sense.def:
To leave someone or something in a particular state or position
pomeni povzročiti, da nekdo ali nekaj ostane ali je v nekem stanju ali položaju.

seg.quote: Who left the gates open?
The result has left everybody dissatisfied.
You are left with two alternatives.
Leave a space between the fridge and the wall.

sense.def:
To leave something to someone
pomeni nekomu dodeliti odgovornost za obravnavo nečesa.

seg.quote: He said the whole business should be left to the courts.
Leave it with me, I'll fix it.

sense.def:
To leave something until a particular time
pomeni prestaviti ukvarjanje z nečim na poznejši čas.

seg.quote: Why do you always leave things to the last minute?

sense.def:
To leave a particular subject
pomeni prenehati govoriti o določeni témi in načeti drugo.

seg.quote: Let's leave the budget and go on to another question.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
leaves property or money to someone
, uredi tako, da po njegovi smrti tista oseba dobi njegovo lastnino ali denar.

seg.quote: She did not leave a very large legacy.

sense.def:
Leave
je obdobje, ko smo na počitnicah, ne pa v službi, ali ko smo zaradi kakšnega drugačnega razloga odsotni.

seg.quote: He'd come over on leave from Northern Ireland.
...sick leave.

sense.def:
Leaves
je tudi množina samostalnika
leaf
.

To leave someone or something behind
pomeni za vedno oditi od nekoga ali nečesa.

seg.quote: I hated having to leave behind all my friends.

sense.def:
To leave an object or a situation behind
pomeni, da neki predmet ali okoliščine ostanejo na nekem kraju, potem ko odidemo.

seg.quote: Millie had left her watch behind.
...leaving behind an unsolved mystery.

sense.def:
To leave someone or something off a list
pomeni ne vključiti nekoga ali nečesa v seznam.

seg.quote: Hopper was too important to be left off the guest list.

sense.def:
To continue doing something from where one left off
pomeni, da nekdo znova začne nekaj delati tam, kjer je prejšnjikrat prenehal.

seg.quote: He sat down at the piano again and started playing from where he left off.

sense.def:
To leave a person or thing out
pomeni nekoga ali nečesa ne vključiti v nekaj.

seg.quote: One or two scenes in the play were left out.
